content.raw:
In atlas.urdf, the scale for several links is set to 100.0. Looking at the corresponding .dae file the resolution of the joint is set to centimeters

    <unit meter="1.0" name="centimeter"></unit>

This screws up our model loader, as it uses the correct units and now the links are extremely big. Especially considering .sdf/.urdf are interchange formats, it is poor form to compensate for errors in the model file (I can disable scaling in our loader but everything that actually uses scale will be screwed up).
